value:
$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|The ocean is so calm. Something
about it reminds me of home...$k$pOh, wait! No time for distraction—I've
got to prepare for Lord Roy's arrival!$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|Oh! There you are, Wolt! I expected
you'd be out swimming... Are the
waves not exciting enough for you?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|Ah, no, not right now... Oh! But I can
serve as your lifeguard if you want to
dive in!$k$pI'm happy to keep you safe. You're
important to Lord Roy, after all, so
I'll protect you no matter what!$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|I'm no more important to Roy than
you are, Wolt! You've been like
brothers since you were children!$k$pAnd since you're so important to him,
I'll be sure to protect you too—just as
I would any friend of his!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|This is as far as we can take this,
Wolt. Let's retreat while we have
the opportunity!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|Of course, Lady Lilina. There's a
path that way. Let's go!$k$p$Sbs150|
